definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: troubled pool (Aram. id., 0egmo0, As. agammu Dl:W)—´[[א]] abs. Is 35:7; cstr. Is 41:18 + 2 t.; [[אֲגַמִּים]] Ex 8:1 + 2 t.; [[אַגְמֵי]] Is 14:23; [[אַגְמֵיהֶם]] Ex 7:19—
troubled or muddy (gloomy) pools or marshes, pl. [[מַיִם]] ´[[א]] Is 14:23.
any pool, pond, sg. [[מַיִם]] ´[[א]] Is 41:18, Ps 107:35, Ps 114:8; pl. without [[מַיִם]] Ex 7:19, Ex 8:1 (P) Is 42:15.
